Company

Orangescape Technologies Limited

Company Master Detail on Orangescape Technologies Limited

Orangescape Technologies Limited is a Public Company incorporated on 11-12-2003. It is classified as Company limited by Shares and is registered at Registrar of Companies, Chennai. Its Authorized Share Capital is Rs. 125000 and its Paid Up Capital is Rs. 125000. It is involved in Financial and insurance activities.

Orangescape Technologies Limited is a Indian Non-Government Company. There are 3 Directors associated with Orangescape Technologies Limited. Directors of Orangescape Technologies Limited are SHARAD SHARMA, SURESH SABAPATHY SAMBANDAM, SABAPATHY SAMBANDAM. As per the records of Ministry of Corporate Affairs (MCA), Orangescape Technologies Limited's last Annual General Meeting (AGM) was held on 28-09-2017, and the date of latest Balance Sheet is 31-03-2017.

Corporate Identification Number (CIN) of Orangescape Technologies Limited is U72200TN2003PLC052129 and its Registration Number is 52129. Its Registered Address is 3RD FLOOR, D BLOCK, NORTH WING, TIDEL PARK NO 4, RAJIV GANDHI SALAI, TARAMANI CHENNAI TN 600113 IN , Tamil Nadu, INDIA. Orangescape Technologies Limited Email Address is ops.admin@orangescape.com.

Current Status of Orangescape Technologies Limited is Active.
